channel.title: CVE Feed for Gnome -- GDM3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Gnome -- GDM3

item.title: CVE-2020-16125|2024-09-17T03:59:24.216Z -- gnome -- gdm3
item.description: gdm3 versions before 3.36.2 or 3.38.2 would start gnome-initial-setup if gdm3 can't contact the accountservice service via dbus in a timely manner; on Ubuntu (and potentially derivatives) this could be be chained with an additional issue that could allow a local user to create a new privileged account.
